labels.label: First Steps
Your first steps in todoyu

This wizard guides you through the first steps in todoyu. The whole procedure will take only a few minutes of your valuable time. Afterwards you will have a ready to work installation.

Please press the "continue" button to start.
Job Types
Please enter job types you usually use in your company and projects. You can change them any time in the administration section

Job types could be:
CEO, CFO, manager, team leader, secretary, sales
Project Roles
Please fill in the project roles you usually have in your project.

To give you an idea what this could be: In the todoyu team we have the following project roles:
project manager, developer, frontend engineer, product manager, marketing responsible, community manager, trainer
Activities
Activities define the kind of work you assign to your team.
Activities can be consulting, programming, support, internal work...
User Groups
The user groups are used for administration purposes. You can define the different rights per group.

Quite often the user groups are bound to the job types you previously entered. But it is up to you to define as many groups as you want. In the administration section you then can change the rights for each group.
Your Company
Please enter the basic information of your company. You can change that any times in the contacts section.
Employees
Now tell todoyu who your team members are. Define the basis personal information - the users can change their data any time in their profile.
Customers
Hopefully you already have some customers at this point. Great! Please enter the basic information.
First Project
Finally, start with your very first project in todoyu. Congratulations!
That's it!

You now have successfully entered all the necessary information to work with todoyu smoothly.

Enjoy it!
